name: laudspeaker
description: Laudspeaker is an open source customer messaging platform for sending product emails, in app messages and campaigns. It supports segmentation, templates and event based triggers, and can be self hosted for full control over customer data.
features: Customer Messaging: Email campaigns, In-app messages, Push notifications. Reach customers on every channel.
Event-Driven: Trigger-based messaging, User behavior tracking, Automated workflows. Send messages at the right time.
Segmentation: Customer segments, Targeted campaigns, Personalization. Deliver relevant messages to each user.
Self-Hosted: Full data control, Privacy-focused, Custom deployment. Own your customer communication platform.
